sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../CSS/infobar.css"; import "../App.css"; interface infoBarprop { taskID: string; } export function Infobar({ taskID }: infoBarprop) { const crossimg = require("../Images/rightSidebar-cross.png"); const starON = require("../Images/task-star-On.png"); const starOff = require("../Images/task-star.png"); const myDaySun = require("../Images/infobar-myDaySun.png"); const alarmimg = require("../Images/rightSidebar-alarm.png"); const latertodayimg = require("../Images/infobar-latertoday.png"); const tomorowimg = require("../Images/infobar-tomorow.png"); const nextweekimg = require("../Images/infobar-nextweek.png"); const calenderimg = require("../Images/rightsidebar-calender.png"); const repeatimg = require("../Images/task-repeat.png"); const deleteimg = require("../Images/infobar-delete.png"); const days = ["Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"]; const months = [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Nov", "Dec", ]; const [infobarObj, setinfobar] = useState({ genClass: "infoBar infobar-general", name: "", steps: [], remind: null, dueDate: null, repeat: null, note: "", createdOn: null, important: false, }); const today = new Date(); return (
{infobarObj.name}
Add to My Day
Remind me{" "} {infobarObj.remind ? `at ${infobarObj.remind.getHours()}:00` : ""}
{infobarObj.remind ? `${ days[infobarObj.remind.getDay()] }, ${infobarObj.remind.getDate()} ${ months[infobarObj.remind.getMonth()] } ` : ""}
Later Today
{`${days[today.getDay()]}, 22:00`}
Tomorow
{`${ days[today.getDay() + 1] }, ${today.getHours()}:00`}
Next Week
Sun, 9:00
Pick a date and time
{infobarObj.dueDate ? `${ days[infobarObj.dueDate.getDay()] }, ${infobarObj.dueDate.getDate()} ${ months[infobarObj.dueDate.getMonth()] }` : "Add a due date"}
Today
{`${days[today.getDay()]}, 22:00`}
Tomorow
{`${days[today.getDay() + 1]}, 22:00`}
Next Week
Sun, 9:00
Pick a date and time
{infobarObj.repeat ? `${infobarObj.repeat.freq}` : "Repeat"}
{infobarObj.repeat ? `${infobarObj.repeat.on.join(", ")}` : ""}
Daily
Weekdays
Weekly
Monthly
Yearly
Custom
{infobarObj.createdOn ? `Created on ${infobarObj.createdOn.getDate()} ${ months[infobarObj.createdOn.getMonth()] }` : ""}
); }
